artist: Designer: Henry Dreyfuss; Draftsman: Alvin R. Tilley
description: technical drawings of three standing men seen from front, with various body proportions measured; text at top and bottom
medium: Black marker over graphite on gray linen
provenance: Henry Dreyfuss Associates, New York, 1955-1996;  private collection, St. Paul, 1996-2010; gave to MIA
signed: LLC, printed in black: [(C) 1966 HENRY DREYFUSS]
title: Three Basic Human Body Types--Frontal
